overview:
Hilary Albutt runs Incrediblesoftwaresolutions.co.za building search engine accessible, findable web sites and developing the new standard in data security, supplying RFID stock control and access system for retail and SME businesses.

Hilary Albutt has a history of excellence and attention to detail, having run her motor vehicle company with a reputation for exceptional excellence and commitment to her clients, which is still legendary, ten years after.

After being severely injured in a industrial accident and disabled and almost completely wheelchair bound, with her stubborn refusal to give up the fight to regain her mobility resulted in her getting back on her feet.

During this time she continued her studies into programming.

Hilary had been a computer geek from high school where as a young woman she was told that â€œwomen cannot do computersâ€, the motor industry told her the same thing.

In her working career she started first as the only female motor mechanic in South Africa, then technician, service advisor, then owner manager of her own firm.

A great self starter, this dynamic and determined woman has continued her history of customer focused service excellence and innovation with this endeavour.
